titles.title: A bill to allow certain Federal minerals to be mined consistent with the Bull Mountains Mining Plan Modification.
A bill to allow certain Federal minerals to be mined consistent with the Bull Mountains Mining Plan Modification.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 118-394.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Manchin with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 625.

committee.name: Senate Energy and Natural Resources
committee.activity: Reported By, Markup By, Referred To
